name: DailyFacts
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
After enabling the Daily Facts skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.
 
Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Daily Facts to the top of your news brief!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
